text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Students are showing off their skills<n>to the trainers at the
academy's big<n>tryout race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though everyone is putting their heart<n>into it, one racer has
no problem<n>outshining them.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Now I'll really let loose!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaah! Wooo!!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
M-Maruzensky's picking up even<n>more speed! She's
leaving the pack<n>behind! No one can catch up now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff... Hehe, the windon my face feels great!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: L-look at her!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's strong, beautiful, and faster<n>than the wind...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Looks like I still got more in the tank!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But what makes her special is that<n>she's having more fun
than anyone<n>else on the track.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
That's it! Maruzensky takes first!<n>She blew the competition
away—a<n>fantastic run!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaah! Wooo!!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Phew! Aaah, I feel great after that. ♪ I<n>almost wish it wasn't
over so quick.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Maruzenkyyy! Wow! Just, wow! You<n>were great!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I-I've never seen such a fast time!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, hi, everyone! Aren't you sweet<n>for cheering me on!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I cried, it was so amazing! I wanna be<n>as fast as you
someday! Can we go<n>partner running again soon?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, that's no sweat. We could do<n>it right after this! I'm
always amped<n>for another run. ♪

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, a victory with a huge lead, and<n>still ready for more?
You're something<n>else, Maruzensky!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You've got an engine like no other.<n>So, please... join my
team,<n>Maruzensky!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Alrighty—wait, what?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky, you'll be our ace!<n>Maruzensky! Let's talk,
okay?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh goodness...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After her fantastic tryout race, she's<n>surrounded by trainers
all wanting her<n>on their team.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It seems she's got other ideas<n>though...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Come on, Maruzensky—a racer like<n>you could be an
undefeated Triple<n>Crown Champion! Let's make it<n>
happen!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That certainly sounds exciting, but... I<n>have to say no. I
appreciate your<n>enthusiasm though.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You're going to become a racing<n>legend! Let me help you
write your<n>name down in history!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, isn't that a bit of anexaggeration? I don't think I've gotthat much potential. Sorry. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky is approached by trainer<n>after trainer but
politely refuses them<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Hey... She's been turning down<n>trainers left and right—even
since<n>before the tryouts. Why is that?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I bet she's got her sights set higher<n>than all of them
combined!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you're right, of course! I hope I<n>get to see her work with
a trainer who<n>deserves her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In the end, she didn't sign on with<n>any of the trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Then, on a quiet evening a few days<n>later...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I happen to be walking past the<n>training course when I see<n>
Maruzensky, her hair flowing back as<n>she runs.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Let's see... Still time. Okay, think I'll<n>do one more lap. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Here goes!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff... Haha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The excitement I felt at the tryouts<n>flutters through my heart
again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She really—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Faster... Faster!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: —looks so happy on the track, like<n>she's having a blast!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew. Doesn't getany better. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Hey, you're the trainer from the<n>other day at the
tryouts... Right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Hey, you're the trainer from the<n>other day at the
tryouts... Right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, did you come all this way to try<n>and scout me? Hehe,
that's some<n>nice commitment.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
So, what kind of approach will you<n>use? Something like how
you saw<n>future glory in my running?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
So, what kind of approach will you<n>use? Something like how
you saw<n>future glory in my running?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Just?
choice_data_list:
I just thought you enjoy running like no-one
else does.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh? Just that?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, I never... That's really all?<n>Wow...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Haha! You're unusual—I'll give you<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Haha! You're unusual—I'll give you<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm going to keep on running,<n>so... you keep on
watching if you'd<n>like.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm going to keep on running,<n>so... you keep on
watching if you'd<n>like.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so I keep on watching. It's<n>insane how fast she runs,
but she<n>always looks happy while she does<n>it.
